main.websiteDesc: Corporate websites, e-commerce platforms, custom web application development
main.appDesc: iOS, Android native apps, cross-platform mobile solutions
main.uiDesc: User interface design, user experience optimization, brand visual design
main.consultingDesc: Technical architecture consulting, project planning, technical team training
main.feature1Desc: Technical experts with years of industry experience
main.feature2Desc: Strict code review and testing processes
main.feature3Desc: Complete projects on schedule, ensure timely launch

websiteDev.introDesc: We provide end-to-end website development services from requirements analysis, design, development to deployment and maintenance, ensuring your website achieves optimal performance in functionality, performance, and user experience.
websiteDev.feature1Desc: Brand display, product introduction, news updates, contact modules
websiteDev.feature2Desc: Product management, shopping cart, payment integration, order processing system
websiteDev.feature3Desc: Adapt to various devices, perfect display on mobile, tablet, and computer
websiteDev.feature4Desc: Content management, data statistics, user management and other backend functions
websiteDev.step1Desc: In-depth understanding of business needs, develop project plan
websiteDev.step2Desc: Design user interface and user experience flow
websiteDev.step3Desc: Frontend and backend parallel development, regular demonstrations
websiteDev.step4Desc: Comprehensive testing, deployment launch, ongoing maintenance

appDev.introDesc: We specialize in iOS and Android platform app development, providing end-to-end services from concept design to app store publishing, ensuring applications meet the highest standards in performance, security, and user experience.
appDev.iosDesc: Using Swift and UIKit to create smooth native iOS applications
appDev.androidDesc: Based on Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, develop high-performance Android applications
appDev.crossDesc: Using React Native or Flutter, one codebase runs on multiple platforms
appDev.type2Desc: Instant messaging, content sharing, community interaction
appDev.type3Desc: Productivity tools, life assistants, professional tools
appDev.type4Desc: Internal management, business processing, mobile office
